Empty.description: If specified, creates an empty file, which stops MSBuild from further scanning for more Directory.Build.props.

MultiLevelMerge.description: If specified, makes MSBuild continue scanning the directory structure upward for the next Directory.Build.props and merges it into this file.

WarningsAsErrors.description: If specified, treats warnings as errors when 'Configuration' is 'Release', except for 'CS0618'.
